msContents.summary: An agreement made by Tikas and Hor, her brother-in-law, in regard to a sum of money which Tikas had borrowed from Hor, and for which she gave as security the documents giving title to a half part of a house, perhaps the same as she had bought from Patous.

condition.ab: This brown dark papyrus preserves the left and right margins. The papyrus is damaged as a result of some vertical folds. Some fibers have been removed at the middle to the lower part of the papyrus. Some restoration needs to be done on this papyrus. (MA)

div.ab: [year . . . month . . . of, . . . . of Pharaoh Ptolemy, son of Ptolemy and Arsinoe the gods who love their father . . . . . ;the agreement to which Tikas, daughter of Teos, her mother (being) Tanas and Hor, son of Patous, his mother (being) Nebwotis, come in the presence of the ìrbt Peteȭris, (son of) . . . . . . . , in year . . . month . . . ;They spoke in the presence of the ìrbt Peteȭris aforesaid, saying:;We have given to thee the letter of agreement (whose conditions) are written below (in regard to) the 150 (deben) 4 kite of silver.;The woman Tikas, daughter of Teos, aforesaid, says it 9in the presence of) Peteȭris, the ìrbt aforesaid:;Hor, son of Patous, aforesaid, has given to me 150 (deben) 4 kite of silver, being 752 staters, being 150 (deben) 4 kite of silver again, at (the rate of) 24 (kite) of copper to 2 kite (of silver), principal and interest, in year . . . month . . I have received them from his hand ; my heart is satisfied therewith; thy are complete without remainder.;I have given to him the document of specie payment and the document of cession pertaining to my half part of the house . . . . together with the half part of its courtyard . . . . measuring 25 divine-cubits south to north by 6 divine-cubits east to west . . . . . . . . the neighbors of my half part of the house together with the half part of the courtyard aforesaid are: south, . . . . . . . , north, . . . . . . . . , east, . . . . . . . . . . ., west, . . . . . . . .;If I have given
